client
Interface MessageToServer

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMessageToServer, IMMessage
public interface MessageToServer

Interface for messages to the server. Each message must have a text body and must be cancel-able. When it comes time to send a given message to the server, the OutgoingMessageManager will only send it if it has not yet been cancelled.

Method Summary
 void cancel()
          Cancels the message.
 java.lang.String getMessageText()
          Returns the text of the message, according to the network protocol grammar.
 boolean isCanceled()
          Checks whether the message has been canceled.
